headline: Seagate (STX) Is Up 12.3% After Strong Earnings and Dividend Hike Is Its Growth Story Evolving?
summary: Seagate Technology Holdings recently reported strong financial results for the first quarter ended October 3, 2025, with sales rising to US$2.63 billion and net income reaching US$549 million, along with a 3% increase in its quarterly dividend to US$0.74 per share. The company's advancement in HAMR technology and continued buybacks highlight management's confidence in Seagate's operational momentum and future demand from the data center segment. We'll explore how Seagate's dividend increase...

headline: Seagate Announces Exchanges With Holders of $500 Million Principal Amount of Exchangeable Notes
summary: SINGAPORE, November 05, 2025--Seagate Technology Holdings plc (NASDAQ: STX) ("Seagate" or "us") and Seagate HDD Cayman, a subsidiary of Seagate ("Seagate HDD"), today announced that on November 4, 2025, they entered into separate, privately negotiated exchange agreements with a limited number of holders of Seagate HDD’s 3.50% Exchangeable Senior Notes due 2028 (the "notes") to exchange (collectively, the "exchanges") $500 million principal amount of notes for consideration consisting of an aggre

content.title: Seagate Announces Exchanges With Holders of $500 Million Principal Amount of Exchangeable Notes
